languages.text: "Пускай ваше положение и отличалось от обычного служения одному из институтов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, отныне вас ждет другая судьба — избранная за вас Лорд-капитаном. Смиритесь с этой мыслью как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "Пускай ваше положение и отличалось от обычного служения одному из институтов Империума, отныне вас ждет другая судьба — избранная за вас Лорд-капитаном. Смиритесь с этой мыслью как можно скорее".

languages.text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."
languages.original_text: "Пускай ваше положение и отличалось от обычного служения одному из институтов {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}, отныне вас ждет другая судьба — избранная за вас Лорд-капитаном. Смиритесь с этой мыслью как можно скорее".

traits.locale_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

"Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

"Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

"Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

"Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

languages.text: “或许您之前效力于{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}机构，以传统的方式为帝国服务。但从现在开始，您的命运将会变得截然不同。舰长大人亲手为您选择了这样的命运，我建议您尽快接受新的现状。”
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: “或许您之前效力于{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}机构，以传统的方式为帝国服务。但从现在开始，您的命运将会变得截然不同。舰长大人亲手为您选择了这样的命运，我建议您尽快接受新的现状。”

languages.text: «Su antigua posición era distinta al servicio convencional a las instituciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, pero, a partir de ahora, le espera el destino que la Lord Capitán ha elegido para usted. Le recomiendo que lo acepte a la mayor brevedad posible».
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Su antigua posición era distinta al servicio convencional a las instituciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, pero, a partir de ahora, le espera el destino que la Lord Capitán ha elegido para usted. Le recomiendo que lo acepte a la mayor brevedad posible».

languages.text: 「あなたの以前の立場は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の機関の一部としての従来の奉仕とは異なるものであったかもしれませんが、これからは別の運命、ロード・キャプテンがあなたのためにお選びになった運命があなたを待っています。一刻も早くこの現実を受け入れることをお勧めします」
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの以前の立場は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の機関の一部としての従来の奉仕とは異なるものであったかもしれませんが、これからは別の運命があなたを待っています。ロード・キャプテンがあなたのためにお選びになった運命です。私はあなたに一刻も早くこの現実を受け入れることをお勧めします」
「あなたの以前の立場は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の機関の一部としての従来の奉仕とは異なるものであったかもしれませんが、これからは別の運命、ロード・キャプテンがあなたのためにお選びになった運命があなたを待っています。一刻も早くこの現実を受け入れることをお勧めします」

languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the Imperium, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

languages.text: « Votre ancien poste au sein de l'une des institutions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} n'était peut-être pas conventionnel, mais un nouveau destin vous attend désormais : un destin choisi pour vous par la seigneure-capitaine. Je vous recommande de vous faire à cette nouvelle réalité aussi vite que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Votre ancien poste au sein de l'une des institutions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} n'était peut-être pas conventionnel, mais un nouveau destin vous attend désormais : un destin choisi pour vous par la seigneure-capitaine. Je vous recommande de vous faire à cette nouvelle réalité aussi vite que possible. »

languages.text: "Eure bisherige Position mag sich im Rahmen einer der Institutionen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} von herkömmlichen Diensten unterschieden haben, doch von nun an erwartet Euch ein anderes Schicksal – das der Lord Captain für Euch bestimmen wird. Ich rate Euch, diese Realität so schnell wie möglich anzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Eure bisherige Position mag sich im Rahmen einer der Institutionen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} von herkömmlichen Diensten unterschieden haben, doch von nun an erwartet Euch ein anderes Schicksal – das der Lord Captain für Euch bestimmen wird. Ich rate Euch, diese Realität so schnell wie möglich anzunehmen."

languages.text: "Eski mevkiniz, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} kurumlarının bir parçası olarak verilen geleneksel hizmetlerden farklı olabilir ancak bundan böyle önünüzde bambaşka bir kader uzanıyor. Lord Kaptan'ın size tayin ettiği bir kader. Bu hakikati bir an önce kabullenmenizi tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "Your former position may have been different from conventional service as part of one of the institutions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, but from now on, a different fate awaits you — one chosen for you by the Lord Captain. I advise you to come to terms with this reality as quickly as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Eski mevkiniz, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} kurumlarının bir parçası olarak verilen geleneksel hizmetlerden farklı olabilir ancak bundan böyle önünüzde bambaşka bir kader uzanıyor. Lord Kaptan'ın size tayin ettiği bir kader. Bu hakikati bir an önce kabullenmenizi tavsiye ederim."
